rows.label: qst105601_msg001
rows.name: Hey, Sensei, long time no see!

rows.label: qst105601_msg002
rows.name:
I cannot accept that Luxuria is not
the legitimate successor to Adel.

rows.label: qst105601_msg0001
rows.name: *sigh*...

rows.label: qst105601_msg0002
rows.name:
Liberbrant-sensei! It's
been a while, eh?

rows.label: qst105601_msg0003
rows.name:
Hm...? Oh! Your Highness!
It is you, Your Highness!

rows.label: qst105601_msg0004
rows.name:
It has been long... Saika-sama,
I am glad to see you are well.

rows.label: qst105601_msg0005
rows.name:
Thanks, Liberbrant-sensei! Glad
to see you're doin' well, too.

rows.label: qst105601_msg0006
rows.name:
This old Sensei here was
the prince's tutor.

rows.label: qst105601_msg0007
rows.name:
He's been lookin' after me
since I was a little tyke.

rows.label: qst105601_msg0008
rows.name:
So, Sensei... what's with the
long sigh? Somethin' wrong?

rows.label: qst105601_msg0009
rows.name:
No... It is nothing that
a busy man like Your Highness
need worry about...

rows.label: qst105601_msg0010
rows.name:
Sayin' that with such a glum
face isn't very convincin'.

rows.label: qst105601_msg0011
rows.name:
Don't worry about it,
just tell me, Sensei.

rows.label: qst105601_msg0012
rows.name: Very well... then...

rows.label: qst105601_msg0013
rows.name:
I feel it is somewhat painful to
ask Your Highness this, but...

rows.label: qst105601_msg0014
rows.name:
I have heard talk that the royal
family of Luxuria is not the
legitimate successor to Adel-sama...

rows.label: qst105601_msg0015
rows.name:
Is it true that Adel-sama and
the King... that Your Highness...
are not related by blood?

rows.label: qst105601_msg0016
rows.name: It's true. A real shame, ain't it...

rows.label: qst105601_msg0017
rows.name:
N-No...! Then the retainers,
the people, have been
deceived for so long...?!

rows.label: qst105601_msg0018
rows.name:
I cannot believe it! And I held
King ZÃ¶lich and his predecessors
in such high esteem...

rows.label: qst105601_msg0019
rows.name:
No, it is merely a rumor.
Someone must be taking
advantage of the chaos...

rows.label: qst105601_msg0020
rows.name:
Liberbrant-sensei, I'm sorry,
but it ain't a rumor.

rows.label: qst105601_msg0021
rows.name: But...

rows.label: qst105601_msg0022
rows.name:
I know well you don't believe
things without proof, Sensei.

rows.label: qst105601_msg0023
rows.name:
After all, you're the one who taught
me since I was a kid not to believe
what I haven't seen with my own eyes.

rows.label: qst105601_msg0024
rows.name:
Leave it to me! I'm gonna go
have a chat with my old man.

rows.label: qst105601_msg0025
rows.name: Prince, what are you going to do?

rows.label: qst105601_msg0026
rows.name: I'm goin' to that room.

rows.label: qst105601_msg0027
rows.name:
With all those ornaments
around, there's gotta be
somethin' in writing.

rows.label: qst105601_msg0028
rows.name:
Is that wise, Prince...? Isn't
that gonna cause a huge stir?

rows.label: qst105601_msg0029
rows.name:
Who cares? Hidin' it
now won't do any good.

rows.label: qst105601_msg0030
rows.name:
This may be painful for
you, Sensei... Are you
still alright with this?

rows.label: qst105601_msg0031
rows.name: ...As Your Highness wishes.

rows.label: qst105601_msg0032
rows.name: Right then, let's go ask my old man.
